name: Automofilia
description:
A fake 3D driving game I made a looong time ago, in it's first fully playable form! :-D

CONTROLS

Drive with Arrow Keys/WASD
HOLD Space bar to drift
Press Enter to restart the lap
Esc key to exit the game

Try to beat the record, and then improve your own best lap! 

...Mine is 11.25 seconds ;-)
